validationReport.statement: PDF file is not compliant with Validation Profile requirements.

rule.description: The value of "pdfaid:part" shall be the part number of ISO 19005 to which the file conforms

check.errorMessage: The "part" property of the PDF/A Identification Schema is 3 instead of 2 for PDF/A-2 conforming file

rule.description: For every font embedded in a conforming file and used for rendering, the glyph width information in the font dictionary and in the embedded font program shall be consistent
rule.test: renderingMode == 3 || widthFromFontProgram == null || widthFromDictionary == null || Math.abs(widthFromFontProgram - widthFromDictionary) <= 1

check.errorMessage: Glyph width 274.4140625 in the embedded font program is not consistent with the Widths entry of the font dictionary (value 272)
